charges.charge_description: 18:472 POSSESSION PASSING COUNTERFEIT CURRENCY WITH INTENT TO DEFRAUD (5)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is plc on prob for 3 yrs on the fol T/C: 1-that he shall comply w/the rules &; regs of the P/O &; GO 318; 2-dft shall reside for a period of 6 mos in a CCC, as dir by the P/O, &; shall observe the rules &; that facility; 3-if the amt of any mandatory assessment, restitution or fine imposed by this jgm remains unpaid at the commencement of the term of community supv, dft shall pay such remainder as dir by the P/O; 4-that dft shall perform 120 hrs of community svc, as dir by the P/O. Purs to 18:3663, it is ord that dft shall mk restitution to the fol aggrieved ptys in the fol amts: Becker Surf Shop, 23755 W. Malibu Rd., Malibu, CA 90265, Attn: Tim Dion, in the amt of $100; Sunglass Safari Shop, 23733 W. Malibu Rd., #400, Malibu, CA 90265, Attn: Edgar Brekke, in the amt of $100. It is ord that the sent as to residence in the CCC is stayed til 8/28/95 &; that dft's bond shall be exon upn his placement in the CCC. S/A $50. On oral mot of the govt, rem cts are ord dism. (5)
On oral mot of the govt, rem cts are ord dism. (1-2)

charges.charge_description: 18:472 POSSESSION PASSING COUNTERFEIT CURRENCY WITH INTENT TO DEFRAUD (3-4)

charges.charge_disposition: On oral mot of the govt, rem cts are ord dism. (3-4)
